text: Panuga Riou (born 13 March 1992) is a badminton player from England. She started playing badminton at age 10, and in 2012 she became the finalist of the Polish International tournament. She earned a Sport and Social Science degree at the University of Bath. == Achievements == === BWF International Challenge/Series === Women's singles {| class="sortable wikitable" style="font-size: 90%;" !
